wikipedia_page.main: David Thomas Hughes (born 19 March 1958) is an English former footballer who made 87 appearances in the Football League playing for Aston Villa, Lincoln City and Scunthorpe United, before moving into non-league football with Worcester City. He played as a midfielder.
